body.p: We the undersigned petitioners of Said Co Petition the Honerabl Govenor, Thomas. E. Bramlet of Kentucky, To Remit a Fine assessed for $7 -- ^before Geo. Hill a Justice of the Peace in Owen Co^ against Salam Wiley in of said County for an act of said Wileys wife in taking her own part against the wife of George Gains for an Insult given by said Gains wife to said Wiley's in Regard to policiks said Gains wife said it would not be a year before a negro man would be as Riding by the side of the Daughters of Mrs Wiley Mrs Wiley had too much Resentment to bear it and slaped said Gains Wife Down Wiley and wife being Union, the other Secesh, they got a writ and taken them before a secesh court and find said Wiley $7 or 8 Dollars for which the undersigned union men petition Your Honer to Remit said fine, as we as honest men thinks Mrs Wiley done wright Yours Respectfully

H B Glass, W W Glass
Jas Stewart } G W White
Jas. S. Branham
George Marshall
Thomas Coleman
A. S. Jemerson
Granderson Jones
Samuel Jones

Geo Hill
Justice Owen Co
vs
Salem Wiley
$7 --
Write to Salem Wiley to send the exact amt of the fine -- before whom assessed -- what was the offence charged & I will remit. Better get copy of the Judgt & send
